full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I SGRUB THABS DANG SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I SGRUB THABS DANG, SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA 'DI NI CHOS RJE AER TI NI PAndI TA MKHAN PO DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, PAndI TA CHEN PO AA BHYA: K'A RAS MDZAD PA'I SBYIN SREG 'OD KYI SNYE MA, KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO GNYIS PA LEGS BSHAD CHEN PO DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO SOGS KYI DGONGS DANG MTHUN PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
